Container.Name: alexandria
Container.Overview:
Alexandria is a digital library management system for ebooks, audiobooks, and other media. Features include automatic metadata enrichment, Dewey Decimal classification, series tracking, reading progress, and a beautiful web interface.
This is the web frontend. Install alexandria-backend first.
After installation, access the web UI at http://[IP]:3000
Container.Requires: Requires alexandria-backend to be installed and running first.

Config.Name: Origin URL
Config.Description: The public URL where Alexandria will be accessed (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:3000 or https://alexandria.example.com). Required for CSRF protection.

Config.Name: API Host
Config.Description: Hostname of the Alexandria backend container

Config.Name: API Port
Config.Description: Port of the Alexandria backend API
